title: Statement from BSA | The Software Alliance on Today's Safe Harbor Announcement by the Article ...
text: ( Source : BSA - Business Software Alliance ) At a time when companies are seeking much needed clarity, we are beyond disappointed that the Article 29 Working Party failed to embrace the opportunity to provide this necessary clarity to the
